channel.title: Golang并发 on Gopher's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang并发 on Gopher's Blog

item.title: Go语言中的并发机制系列-2|Go的并发哲学 & CSP
item.description: 本系列阅读笔记是基于 Golang 经典图书 Concurrency in GO ，主要有6个章节： An Introduction to Concurrency Modeling Your Code: Communicating Sequential Processes Go’s Concurrency Building Blocks Concurrency Patterns in Go Concurrency at Scale Goroutines and the Go Runtime 本部分主要介绍第二章：Mod

item.title: Go语言中的并发机制系列-1|并发简介
item.description: 本系列阅读笔记是基于 Golang 经典图书 Concurrency in GO ，主要有6个章节： An Introduction to Concurrency Modeling Your Code: Communicating Sequential Processes Go’s Concurrency Building Blocks Concurrency Patterns in Go Concurrency at Scale Goroutines and the Go Runtime 本部分主要介绍第一章：An Introduction
